data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of Chenopodiaceae in Himalaya and Tibet

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sukhorukov, Alexander P., Liu, Pei-Liang, Kushunina, Maria (2019): Taxonomic revision of Chenopodiaceae in Himalaya and Tibet. PhytoKeys 116: 1-141, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.116.27301, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.116.27301
